ISSUE.TITLE: 'Search' function is available even if turn it off in Catalog settings
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.3 and current Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. go to /Admin/Setting/Catalog 2. turn off 'Search enabled' 3. go to Home page act: 'Search' is visible in the Footer navigation exp: no 'Search' link in the Footer navigation 4. follow the link /search act: page is opened, function is available exp: 404 Page not found

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5337 Remove search link from footer if product search function is disabled
